text: Evangeline Rose Gil Eigenmann (June 21, 1963 â€“ August 5, 2022) known professionally as Cherie Gil () was a Filipino actress. Her career began in 1970 and she retired in 2021. She was known for playing villain roles in movies. Gil was born in Manila, the Philippines. Her best known roles were in Manila By Night, Oro, Plata, Mata and Bituing Walang Ningning. In October 2021, Gil was diagnosed with a "rare" form of endometrial cancer. She died from the disease on August 5, 2022 at a hospital in New York City at the age of 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from endometrial cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Filipino movie actors Category:Filipino television actors Category:Actors from Manila
title: Cherie Gil
